attributes.action: Give all NHS health workers a thank you of at least one thousand pounds tax free
attributes.additional_details: Parliament should recognize the NHS health workers and rather than an on-going pay rise which is recognized could be unaffordable a one-off bonus should be given to them. The bonus should be meaningful to staff and a thousand pounds is a great start.
attributes.background: The NHS workers have worked so hard during coronavirus they need a one off bonus. A thousand pounds would make a material difference and should sit alongside any pay rise.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Pay 15% bonus to public facing NHS staff
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/570762

To pay every NHS and Social Care Worker in England a £500 "Thank You" Bonus
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562495

Pay NHS staff a one-off bonus that recognises their efforts to combat covid.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578308
